content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), and small electric pole(position x=7.5, y=0.5)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-80.0)
### Iron plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-82.0)
### Stone brick factory at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace(position x=62.0, y=-54.0)
### Lab at unknown position
Consists of Lab entity with no power

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using Prototype
-  Ensure that the Prototype object has the required attribute before accessing it
### Errors when getting entities
-  Make sure that the entity list is not empty before trying to access its elements
### Errors when checking entity connections
-  Ensure that the entity is connected to the required network before trying to access its connections
### Errors when accessing fluid systems
-  Ensure that the entity has a fluid system before trying to access it
### Errors when accessing entity properties
-  Ensure that the entity has the required property before trying to access it
